item.title: Wearing.java
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Why use .startsWith in this case? That’s not the smartest idea, consdiering they start with the same words. You’re better off using .equals and putting the actual name of the item, their’s not going to be more than one strength caped item that requires 99 strength.

Read full topic

item.title: Wearing.java
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Now I know how to add stuff in this, but I’m confused on why this isn’t working

} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Strength cape")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Strength cape(t)")) { return 120;

When I wear the strength cape(t)it equips you have 99 strength or higher, but I define the strength cape(t) so that can be worn once you hit 120 strength, yet it doesn’t want to do it. I think since I already define anything that starts with “strength cape” it will wear at 99.
Can anyone help me out? Thank you

Read full topic
